main event: A circular, reddish-orange object with a hazy glow was observed moving erratically in the western sky of Seattle for 3-4 minutes.
interesting points: The object was described as having rings of light around its outer edge., It made sudden changes in direction without decreasing speed., The object hovered for about 4 minutes before spreading out and disappearing., It was observed by a supervisor at the ATC in Seattle., The sighting occurred close to the Seattle metro area.
sighted object: circular reddish-orange object with a hazy glow
